channel.title: Command help
channel.description: is it possible to add a timer to a command so you can only do it so often if so how?

item.title: Command help
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“Sir Jay, post:2, topic:376156”]Well good sir, i’ve never used it nor witnessed it but i’m sure its possible by doing something lieeeek

System.currentTimeMillis() - lastCommand something something, idk i’m not the person to answer this lmfao[/quote]

^^ That or use PlayerHandler to make a timer (More complicated and shouldn’t be used)

Read full topic
